review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

review: Star Sky 2 is a game that seems to be about uniting a man and woman who are each walking away from each other on a series of branching paths. On each path, music will sometimes play, and if you pause your movement to that audio cue, it may change the environment, including opening possible new routes if certain conditions are met. There seem to be quite a number of paths, and I found more than half of them during my play. The simple silhouette graphics are inoffensive, if lacking in detail, and the sounds were contemplative, suggesting a profundity to the journey(s). I don't know if the ultimate result was union of the two, but it seemed to be the end of things if all the paths were found and walked. I didn't find it compelling enough to try and discover every possible route or look up what the result of doing so may have been. It wasn't horrible, but there wasn't enough to it to keep me engaged deeply. Nothing more than a time waster. 2/5.

review:
Star Sky non mi aveva entusiasmato con il suo Game Play pressoché inesistente; Il Capitolo 2 purtroppo non si distacca troppo dal capitolo precedente.

L'aggiunta di un ramo femminile aggiunge profondità alla storia, profondità che però non viene percepita se il giocatore deve semplicemente fermarsi nel punto giusto rispettando le giuste condizioni per avviare. 

Note positive sono gli HINT (opzionali), i quali consentono al giocatore di ricevere suggerimenti visivi sugli elementi interattivi e l'interazioni necessarie per scatenare l'evento desiderato.
Non sempre però sono sufficienti, in quanto per alcuni elementi non viene specificato come ottenerli, rendendo frustrante la loro ricerca.

La scarsa partecipazione da parte dell'utente lo rende poco godibile e un passatempo alla lunga noioso anche.

Purtroppo se devo valutare Star Sky come GIOCO la mia valutazione non può dirsi positiva.

author: {'steamid': '76561199086098585', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 88, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1630343198}
review:
[h3]Star Sky 2[/h3]

Wandere über mondbeschienene Hügel, erkunde die Möglichkeiten, die das Leben bietet und enthülle Deine Bestimmung - so heißt das Spiel uns willkommen, mal sehen ob die Handlung auch so weitgreifend ist...

Spielerisch bietet es uns jedenfalls weniger als versprochen, denn um es einmal ganz einfach auszudrücken hat der Spieler die Wahl zwischen einer weiblichen und einer männlichen Figur (Gardener und Dreamwalker). Jede der beiden Figuren wird durch verschiedene Bereiche gesteuert, die Reihenfolge der Zwischenetappen kann meistens durch den Spieler bestimmt werden. Bei den Wanderungen sind dann Entscheidungen zu treffen.

Jede Figur bekommt bald nach dem Beginn der Wanderung einen Gegenstand und verwendet diesen irgendwie und irgendwo. Und je nach dem, für was dieser verwendet wird, verändert sich etwas im Spiel, z.B. fängt es an zu regnen. 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2589084884
Je nach dem, welche Ereignisse nun stattfinden, tritt ein mögliches Erlebnis ein, getrennt für die Frau und den Mann - die auch in Form von Steam-Erfolgen dargestellt werden. Ziel ist es, alle möglichen Erlebnisse irgendwie hin zu bekommen, 

Dies alleine wäre vielleicht noch einfach, ist es aber nicht, denn teilweise beeinflussen sich die Handlungen von Mann und Frau. So bekommt die Frau nur dann einen bestimmten "Erfolg" oder die Grundlage für einen späteren, wenn eine bestimmte Bedingung durch eine Entscheidung des Mannes eingetreten ist. Das alles erweitert die erspielbaren Möglichkeiten und macht alles herrlich kompliziert.

Optisch ist das Spiel minimalistisch gezeichnet, sieht aber dennoch hübsch aus, was an dem teilweise Scherenschnitt-artigen Design und an den Farben liegt. Gespielt wird außerdem mit der Musik, die dem Spieler auch verrät, an welcher Stelle ein Ereignis eintreten kann - also bitte genau hinhören.

Die Steuerung ist denkbar einfach: Beide Figuren laufen in nur eine Richtung: die Frau wird nach links gesteuert, der Mann nach rechts - und es darf auch gerannt werden. Dass nur vorwärts gelaufen werden kann, hat seine ganz eigene Raffinesse. (denn das heißt, dass es kein zurück gibt, verpassen bedeutet von vorne bitte !)

[b]Fazit[/b]: Ein einfach gehaltenes Knobelspiel, das Geduld und Ausprobieren erfordert. Es ist auf jeden Fall ein interessanter Indietitel.

[b]Ezzel a konfigurációval a játék hibátlanul fut.[/b]

A Star Sky egy igazán romantikus, szívmelengető alkotás, amelynek az egyetlen célja, hogy felfedezd az esti séta közben fellelhető csodákat.

[b]Játékmenet: [/b] Sétálj az éjszakai mezőn, tücsökciripelés közepette, békés környezetben a holdfényben. Utad során néha halk zenét hallasz majd, amely az adott helyen lévő checkpointot aktiválja. Ez valamilyen hatást vált ki a tereptárgyakból (például két út közül a jelenlegiről áttérhetsz egy másikra, a karaktered felvesz tárgyakat, stb.). Ha szeretnéd aktiválni a checkpointot, állj meg, hallgasd a zenét, és várd meg, amíg a karakter elvégzi a szükséges teendőket. A játék célja, hogy összegyűjtsd az elérhető achivement-eket. Hogy mindent megszerezd, többször is neki kell indulnod, és minden alkalommal más checkpointokat kell aktiválnod – vagy éppen aktiválás nélkül áthaladni rajtuk.

[b]Látvány: [/b]gyönyörű, nyugalmat árasztó környezet, az esti séták emlékét idéző látvány.

[b]Nehézség: [/b]könnyű, de az összes achivement eléréséhez kicsit törni kell a fejed.

[b]Irányítás: [/b]kizárólag a JOBBRA gombbal lehet haladni*. A FEL gomb megnyomásával a karakter szaladni fog, amivel elkerülhető, hogy aktiválódjon az a checkpoint, amit nem szeretnél aktiválni.

review: Assim como o primeiro jogo (o qual eu havia experimentado há muito tempo atrás), este aqui não perdeu a essência e também se resume em andar pra frente observando diferentes eventos qe acontecem no cenário durante a caminhada... e como não é possível voltar pra trás, é preciso andar calmamente, ouvindo os sons e prestando atenção nos detalhes, pois indicam qndo algo vai acontecer e ao msmo tempo tornam toda a experiência super tranquila e relaxante. A grande diferença é qe agora há mais caminhos e escolhas a serem feitas, e de acordo cm suas ações é possível descobrir novos lugares e até mudar a fase da lua, qe por sua vez permite desbloquear novos eventos e ganhar mais conquistas. Isso também tornou o jogo mais desafiador no sentido de descobrir todos os segredos, já qe há necessidade de ficar repetindo a história e o caminho de diferentes maneiras pra sempre encontrar algo novo; assim com toda certeza vcê vai se encantar se busca um jogo simples, rápido, mas muito bonito, fofo e qe traz uma serena paz de espírito.

author: {'steamid': '76561198193589490', 'num_games_owned': 676, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1533225005}
review:
Wie auch schon im ersten Teil, begeben wir uns, in [i]Star Sky 2 - ブルームーン 2[/i] auf einen nächtlichen Spaziergang, bei dem wir durch aufmerksames Lauschen verschiedene magische und nicht magische Ereignisse entdecken können.
Die Besonderheit am zweiten Teil der [i]Star Sky[/i]-Reihe ist, dass wir dieses Mal, zwei Personen steuern. Diese haben beide für sich eine eigenen Weg, mit unterschiedlichen Ereignissen, zu beschreiten, aber können dennoch in das Schicksal des anderen Eingreifen.

Mit dieser neuen Spielemechanik ist [i]Star Sky 2 - ブルームーン 2[/i] um einiges komplexer als der erste Teil, aber die Rätsel haben immer noch einen sehr angenehmen Schwierigkeitsgrad und durch die ebenfalls neu eingeführten Hinweisboxen, die einem visuelle Tipps zu den diversen Kombinationsmöglichkeiten der Events geben, ist es fast unmöglich irgendwo nicht mehr weiter zukommen und macht somit das Spielerlebnis dadurch wieder sehr entspannt. 

Die Farbgebung ist, wie im ersten Teil der [i]Star Sky[/i]-Reihe, zwar dunkel gehalten, strahlt aber dennoch eine gewisse Wärme aus. Genauso liebevoll wurde auch die Gestaltung der Umgebung gehandhabt, die durch den Einsatz von sanften Animationen, sehr lebendig und friedlich wirkt. Zusammen mit der ruhigen Hintergrundmusik, schafft es auch [i]Star Sky 2 - ブルームーン 2[/i] eine wunderbar verträumte Atmosphäre, die beinahe einen meditativen Charakter hat, zu erschaffen.

Bonuspluspunkt: + Steam-Sammelkarten

[u]Kaufempfehlung[/u]: Im Sale für < 1,64€

review: Star Sky 2 est un petit simulateur de marche, calme et relaxant. Les graphismes très corrects et les sons travaillés permettent d'obtenir une ambiance nocturne agréable et apaisante. Il n'y a par contre pas véritablement de scénario, mais plutôt diverses combinaisons d'évènements qui amènent à différentes fins. Star Sky 2 reste dans la même veine que son prédécesseur, donc si vous avez apprécié Star Sky, vous apprécierez probablement ce deuxième volet. Concernant la durée de vie, il faut compter environ une heure pour terminer le jeu à 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045655704', 'num_games_owned': 3553, 'num_reviews': 207, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1518878075}
review:
[i][b]Star Sky 2 - ブルームーン 2[/b][/i] est, comme son aîné, un petit jeu sympathoche. Si vous avez aimé le premier du nom, il n'y a pas de raison pour que vous n'aimiez pas le deuxième.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1304304714
Le principe est le même, si ce n'est que cette fois deux personnages sont à notre disposition. On dirige le personnage en le faisant avancer ou rester sur place, il ne peut pas reculer, et le but est à nouveau de s'arrêter dans certains endroits pour déclencher des évènements. Mais pour en déclencher certains, il va d'abord falloir en déclencher d'autres. C'est toujours le même système de "combinaisons" d'arrêt ou non.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1304304821
Peut-être un peu moins "magique" que le premier jeu, celui-ci nous offre néanmoins une durée de jeu plus étendue, j'ai mis 1h30 à tout faire/voir sans guide (contre 45 minutes pour le premier). Le fait d'avoir deux chemins différents mais qui utilisent certaines mêmes variables permet aussi de durcir un peu la difficulté, même si rien n'est vraiment compliqué. Le 100% succès reste facile et rapide. Et cerise sur le gâteau, il est moins cher que son grand frère en proposant plus de temps de jeu. Elle est pas belle la vie ?

author: {'steamid': '76561198000145982', 'num_games_owned': 1469, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1506543551}
review:
Неспешная бродилка-адвенчура своеобразного жанра (точь-в-точь ничего не встречал по геймплею). Задача - идти в одном направлении, останавливаясь в ключевых точках с целью просмотра сюжетных сцен. Никакой озвучки, минимализм в графике - по сути, медитативный артхаус, где надо подключать воображение. Люблю такие проекты под настроение :)))
-----------
По многим аспектам игра улучшилась по сравнению с оригиналом:

- Два играбельных персонажа и разнообразие в общей ветки истории (теперь наблюдать за развитием сюжета интересней)

- Графика не сильно ушла вперёд, но если сравнить с оригиналом, то много крутых эффектов в новых сценах - разработчик как мог подтянул визуальнй стиль

- Звуковое сопровождение отличное. Если не нервничать в суматошном поиске всех веток истории, то вполне можно расслабиться и насладиться погружением (играл в наушниках)

- Коллекционные карточки и лёгкие достижения, если задаться целью проходить всю историю (полтора часа наиграно у мекя - именно на такое время можно расчитывать)

- Самое главное, ЦЕНА стала более адекватной по сравнению с оригиналом (по мне, 99 рублей за оригинал - немного перебор)
----
Советуюк к покупке, особенно если будет скидка... т.к, повторюсь, ничего подобного по геймплею не встречал! Разнообразие не повредит в любой области, включая видеоигры :)

review:
GJ，基础玩法系统对比上作有了大幅度的优化，跑步不再忽略场景触发，场景触发提示的音效更早，动画更明显，并且多出了相关条件触发的提示。对我而言，这才算得上一款游戏。

该作如同前作一般，讲述一人黑夜下的独行，路过的风景，不同的抉择，不同的终点，如同人生一般，或平淡或绚丽或灰暗。
不过该作当中角色变为两人，一男一女，为梦而行的男人（dreamwalker）以及身为园丁的女人（Gardener），双方的旅途不同，而又互相影响，这点相当别出心裁，尽管黑夜独行，但并不孤单。
事件触发比前作难了不少，而且因为双角色旅途的选择会互相影响，所以解密难度上会高上不少，算是对于一些喜欢解谜向的玩家的福音。[spoiler]（自我摸索♂一小时后直接打开社区指南了）[/spoiler]
总体评价而言，算一款闲暇时静静心打发打发时间的游戏，推荐50%off或以上购入。

review:
Just like the first game, Star Sky 2 is a beautiful atmospheric game with multiple endings. There two different scenarios in this game where you play as either a Male or a Female. Each character has their own endings and you have to complete every ending in the game to unlock "The End" ending which is a satifying ending in general. Some actions you do for one character will influence the outcome of some endings for the character. However, I have done some actions that led me nowhere but until I reset the game and I did the same thing and got the intended outcome... 

Overall this is another nice walking simulator with a good art style and music that has good replay value thanks to the multiple endings. Though be aware that you might have to restart the game at some points in case you get stuck at times.

Rating: 6/10

review:
Star Sky 2 ist wohl nur für eine recht schmale Zielgruppe interessant. ich gehöre nicht dazu.

Star Sky 2 ist weniger ein Spiel, als vielmehr ein Entspannungsprogramm. Bewusst wird das Tempo aus dem Spiel genommen und gibt es sehr viele Repetitionen. Es ist ein experimentelles 2D Walking Simulator-Spiel mit sehr meditativem Charakter. Wer solche Spiele mag, darf Star Sky 2 gerne eine Chance geben, denn ich kann mir durchaus vorstellen, dass Fans dieser Art von Spiel Gefallen finden können.

Allen anderen kann ich Star Sky 2 aber nicht empfehlen. Selbst Leute, die wie ich offen sind auch mal für etwas ganz anderes, dürfte wie mir schnell die Geduld ausgehen. Dafür gibt es einfach nichts, dass irgendwie herausragend ist. Die Grafik ist ok, aber dann doch zu spartanisch um zu motivieren, die Musik ebenso und es wird auch nicht irgendwie philosophisch etwas aufgeworfen, dass einen wirklich zum nachdenken bringt. Und so nerven dann das langsame Tempo und die ständigen Wiederholungen sehr bald nur noch.

Fazit: Höchstens für Vollblut-Fans von sinnfreien Meditativ-Walking-Simulatoren, die sich von altbackener Grafik nicht abschrecken lassen. Für alle anderen nur langweilig.

review:
[h1]写在前面[/h1]

这是一个享受孤独的游戏。如果只看一代的话，它甚至不能称之为一部“游戏”，而更像是一个艺术作品展示。剧情稀薄，人物只有黑色剪影，操作精简到了极致，游戏内容用两个字就能概括——散步。是的，只有散步。

走在夜半3点的无人小区中，站在深夜4点的马路边看着空荡荡的街道静静地等待着红灯的过去，坐在凌晨5点的海边一个人等待着海上日出，在傍晚6点时突然惊醒，看着外面灰蓝的景色思索着现在到底是早上6点还是晚上6点……如果你喜欢这种被整个世界抛下的孤独感的话，那么，你就会喜欢这个游戏。

我觉得这个游戏它甚至是有点挑人的，它的内容很单一，最大的亮点就是那份“月下漫步”的气氛塑造。它的口味是温和的，没有任何刺激性的香辛料，这让吃惯了重口味的很多人无法适应。它适合能安静下来的人，有耐心的人，能够静静感受这份氛围的人，如果你三者皆不是的话，那你可能会这么说——真无聊。是的，会得出这个结论一点也不意外，大概也只有波长相合的人，才能感受到这个游戏的魅力。如果这个游戏不适合你的话，那可千万别买它w

[h1]蓝月[/h1]

有趣的是，英文版和日文版的标题完全不一样，英文版是《star sky》，而日文版是《blue moon》，相对于前者而言我更喜欢后者。

蓝月，这个词有很多意思。从字面意义上来说，蓝月就是蓝色的月亮。在老农夫年历中是这么描述它的：一个季度中出现了四次满月，其中的第三次满月被称为蓝月。后来被误引用后一个错误的说法反而变得更加广为人知，那就是“蓝月是一个月中的第二个满月”。同时，蓝月也经常被人用来比喻“不常发生的事件”，在这个游戏中，大概这个意思是最准确的。
顺带一提，火山爆发或者是森林大火都有可能让人看到“蓝色的月亮”，游戏中的那两个火山事件可能也是有暗含了这个意思的吧w

[h1]月色真美啊[/h1]

通关第一部之后，我对这个游戏其实是并没有多少感触的。因为它的内容实在是太少了。然而通完第二部后，我改变了主意。第二部加入了很多新要素，让整个游戏变得有点冒险解密的感觉，有点挑战性我很喜欢。
那么——这到底是一个什么样的游戏呢？
简单来说，就是一个人在月光下散步，途中遇到了很多不可思议的事情的游戏。

具体来说就是通过控制人物走路去触发路上的事件，不同的事件组合会出现不同的结果。
操作非常简单，只有走路和跑步两种，而且无法选择往回走，只能一直线往前走。
在可以触发事件的地方会响起一阵悦耳的音乐，听到它后你只要停下脚步来就能自动触发剧情，如果你不想触发的话，只要选择跑步离开这个地点就可以了。当然，我们前面也说过了，这个游戏是无法选择往回走的，也就是说，非常不推荐全程跑步，因为你可能会错过很多事件。而错过后如果还想要看的话唯一的做法就是再玩一次。
不过因为这个游戏的流程真的非常短，大概5分钟就能走完这段路，所以错过了也不会太麻烦。慢慢散步感受这个气氛吧XD
[strike]然而玩到最后还是会变成跑步模拟游戏，我懂的。[/strike]
一代的剧情非常简单，因为它本身的流程也很短，大概一小时上下而已。简单来说，就是在皎洁的月光下发生的一段浪漫的邂逅。因为剧情不是重点，所以显得很无足轻重。
顺带一提我很喜欢一个小细节，一代的女性角色穿着长裙，跑步的时候会特地提着裙子小跑，这种非常细微的地方能看出来制作组的用心。
当然，它的缺点还是很明显的，从游戏时间也可以看出来——那就是内容实在太少了。

[h1]两个步行者[/h1]

到了二代，可操作人物也增加到了两个人。

这个游戏到了二代才比较有意思，因为内容总算是有点复杂了。
相比于一代的单纯试组合，二代更多的是要多方面考虑。虽然两个角色走的都不是同一个地图，但他们仍然是在同一片土地的附近活动，所以一个人做了什么事改变了环境，相对应的另一边的环境也会相应改变。
可变的因素也增多了，一代的可变因素很少，所以总体的可体验内容也不多。二代的可变因素有不少，比如说：下雨或者是晴天，月缺或者是月圆。还有只有一方触发过相应事件后另一方才能触发后续事件的设计，玩的时候要不停地思考这个地方为什么原本有的东西没有了，是不是另一边有相应的事件没有触发？这个探索的过程是蛮有意思的。而且游戏自带了提示，你可以选择开启或关闭，有了提示后游戏难度也不高，可以轻轻松松地玩。
不止是可变因素变多，同时剧情上也有了进步——两位主角都有了各自的身份。相比较于一代的无名主角，二代的主角形象更加丰满一点。那么，二代讲述的是什么故事呢？

[spoiler] 是园丁（女）和梦游者（男）的故事。
园丁想要种植植物，梦游者想要回家。但是如果选择不当的话，梦游者便会坠入地狱。[/spoiler] 

其实说来也就这么两句话而已，本身剧情还是很短，不过跟一代比起来，这已经是一个很大的飞跃了。
此外，它的缺点也很明显——没有配合上山下山做行动调整，还是用平地走的图来马虎应付。那种行走图走走草地还行，走砂石地的话特别明显，整个人都飘在地面上，跟一代的那个提裙子的小细节相比二代的行走图真的很不行。

[h1]总结[/h1]

算是一点参考：我通关一代用了80分钟，通关二代用了3个小时。从游戏时间也可以看出来内容的多寡。

这个游戏主要玩的还是“氛围”。推荐戴上耳机听着蝉鸣鸟啼声，慢慢地漫步于夜色之中。你可能能看到彩虹，可能能看到白夜，可能能看到流星，可能会与人结伴而行，也可能会孤独地一个人走完全程。你可能走到地狱去，也可能走到云层之上。月光笼罩在这片景色之中，为其蒙上了一层浪漫的纱窗。

除去氛围外，我觉得最棒的还是音乐，特别是触发事件的那个声音非常好听。

顺带一提，两部游戏入过包，如果有兴趣的话可以去买慈善包，现在好像还有一个正在进行时的包，其中就包括了一二代。

今作は男性・女性の2人のキャラそれぞれを操作できるようになった。

1時間程度あれば完全クリア出来てしまうでしょう。
やっぱり今作も雰囲気を楽しむだけゲー。
サクッと実績コンプできるので実績マニアにはオススメ。

review:
Devo fare i complimenti agli autori, perchè come seguito del primo Star SKY hanno portato dei miglioramenti
Anche in questo secondo capitolo potete vivere la piacevole esperienza di una romantica passeggiata notturna, in qualsiasi condizione di tempo, sotto la delicata pioggia, ma anche sulla soffice neve, con la differenza che mentre nel primo la donna aveva solo un ruolo marginale,qua abbiamo pari opporunità; nel senso che i vari eventi da visualizzare abbinati agli achievement sono divisi equamente, metà li sbloccherete con la donna e l'altra metà con l'uomo .
Mentre l'uomo è il Sognatore che cammina,la donna è Giardiniera, ognuno ha i suoi compiti, ma come tutte le vere coppie è essenziale collaborare per arrivare alle varie mete, a volte bisogna lavorare per favorire l'altro, ad esempio se alla Giardiniera servono i volatili sull'albero e questi sono dalla parte del Sognatore, allora occorre prima fare una camminata con lui, spaventarli in modo che vadano dalla parte opposta da lei.
Molto bella l'idea di aggiugere delle icone dove fermarsi, cosa che mancava nel primo, osservatele bene quando appaiono perchè sono raffigurate le condizioni richieste per sbloccare un determinato evento, potete notare se c'è la luna piena, o mezza, se cè la pioggia o la neve, o se ill vulcano è attivo o no; fermatevi e memorizzatele,magari scrivendo un piccolo appunto  se volete, in questo modo saprete cosa fare ed eviterete di girare a vuoto.
 Se amate le emozioni è un'esperienza bella da provare,ma anche se siete persone spericolate che devono sentire l'ndrenalina scorrere nel sangue e il pericolo è il vostro mestiere, suvvià rilassatevi un attimo, lasciatevi andare un momento e godetevi questa passeggiata notturna, tutti i Super Eroi hanno i loro momenti romantici in fondo, chissà magari alla fine potete dire: "Mà! non era poi così brutto!" :-D

author: {'steamid': '76561198057334690', 'num_games_owned': 2528, 'num_reviews': 193, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1468333255}
review:
На первую часть я уже писал обзор, который можно посмотреть здесь: http://steamcommunity.com/id/r0manthemirage/recommended/407020/

Теперь по делу. Будет звучать банально, но вторая часть позаимствовала у первой всё самое лучшее (атмосферу, звук и события). И вот эти самые события вывела на новый уровень.
Теперь нам доступны для игры оба персонажа первой часть - парень (имя которого на русский можно дословно перевести как "сновидец") и девушка (имя которой я не могу перевести иначе как дословно "садовница"). Управление осталось тем же - постоянная ходьба в одну сторону, поэтому каждый из героев имеет и свои локации, а в начале игры нам предоставляют выбор - за кого же играть.
Хоть локации у каждого свои, они взаимосвязаны. Что бы поучаствовать в определённом событие одного - нужно выполнить специальные условия на другой части карты. А вот поиск этих самых взаимосвязей и будет занимать у вас много времени.

Описаны плюсы по сравнению с первой частью, все её предыдущие заслуги сохраняются:
+ увеличена продолжительность из-за добавления второго персонажа
+ усложнены головоломки
+ наконец-то работает стим оверлей и меню паузы (хотя настроек по прежнему нет)

Итак, что мы имеет в итоге? По сравнению с первой частью игра выросла, почерпнув всё хорошее из предыдущей (как это было в случае с Portal'ом, например) и так же стоит вашего внимания.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141404871', 'num_games_owned': 910, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1467523725}
review:
If you enjoyed Marten Jonsson's Star Sky, you will enjoy Star Sky 2 even more.  As with all his games each one improves on the walking simulator/puzzle concept.  This game is no exception.

In Star Sky 2 the player interacts with two different characters the woman (the gardener) and the man (the dreamwalker) separately.  The woman walks to the left, the man to the right, each with their own encounters, adventures, and mysteries (puzzles) to solve.  However, both can "interact" or change the circumstances/environments of the other.  This is where the layered mystery is and were the puzzles become more complex. 

An added feature to this game (taken from a previous game called Meadowland) is the hint/clue boxes which occur just before an event.  The hint/clue boxes not only tell the player what to do, and how many events there are, but also what circumstances/conditions need to be present just by looking at the clue picture.  Match the picture and watch the event unfold.  Now just exactly how does one match the picture is the puzzle part and quite often requires the other walker's involvement.  (There are four circumstances/condition variables the walkers effect but I am not saying what since that would spoil the discovery.)

The main "painting" of both the gardener (woman) and the dreamwalker (man) that occurs at the end of each "adventure" is also a huge clue to where events are located.  Also if the player looks closely at the main painting, three different types of pictures occur on the far left under the window showing the type of ending the player recieved: sadness (gravestone), loneliness (torch in hand), or happiness (child in hand) 

Another feature of the game is the ability to "circle" through areas more then once which can be quite helpful when trying to trigger certain events.  

Same light relaxing type of soft music as Star Sky with the same no-stress gameplay.  Relatively short gameplay, I finished in 2 1/2 hours, which is fine with me.  Something light, soothing and positive at the end of a long day is something I do appreciate. Star Sky 2 like Jonsson's other games is a love story.

I very much recommend this game, even at full price.

P.S.  Quick hint for my achievement hunting friends DO NOT skip the ending.

review: I never played Star Sky 1 so this was all new to me.  Star Sky 2 is like no other game I've played or seen before. Its concept of the player choosing their own path is wonderful and its story is so vague you can interpret it many different ways or at least that's what I got out of it. During my playthrough, I checked more than once whether it was windy or pouring rain outside my window because the ingame sounds are so well done I couldn't tell the difference. Overall, I had a blast playing Star Sky 2 and highly recommend this to anyone who wants a short relaxing experience. Seriously, it's really relaxing. It only has 3 controls; Up, Right, and Left on the arrow keys so you can lean back in your chair or lie down in bed with a laptop.

review: The soothing night-time walking simulator is back, with more places to stroll through, more events to wait around and observe, and now you can play a left-walking lady in addition to Right-walking Reggy. Visual cues and hints have been added (and can be turned off for the hardcore night-walkers who don't need hints of where to stand), it's possible to return to the same place during the same session, and there is even a map which will highlight which paths you've already taken and what's still waiting for you. Some may think it's odd that I was giddy to play Star Sky 2 after the first one, but others will appreciate a very serene walking simulator like this, which is great for relaxing or a change of scenery.

If you enjoy walking simulators I recommend it, if you liked the first Star Sky I recommend you buy this and vice versa.

There's absolutelly no reason to buy this game if you do not already enjoy Walking Simulators, you either love them or hate them, don't buy it if you haven't enjoyed previous Walking Simulators.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019984380', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1599389770}
review:
Star Sky 2 by se dal nazvat bipolární simulátor. Na jedné straně hra působí dosti depresivně - u stromu stojí žena a muž a každý se vydává svou cestou. Do neznáma neboli voidu, jak by řekli naši přátelé nihilisti. Celkově ta atmosféra, kdy osamoceně bloudíte světem, může vyvolat pocity, že byste vzali svůj flash disk a usb portem si snažili protnout žíly. 

Je tu však i ta druhá, manická stránka. Ve hře měníte běh událostí, způsobíte například padání hvězd, velký svit měsíce, jaký by záviděli v každém foto studiu a tak dále. To ve vás naopak může vyvolat pocity blaženosti, megalomanství a nekonečné euforie, jako po vypití lahve prvotřídního koňaku.

Hra sama o sobě může přijít nudná. Mě osobně však atmosféra dosti pohltila a myslím si, že nejsem sám, kdo to tak má. A hej, zas tak drahé to není, takže za vyzkoušení to určitě stojí.

A pokud vám hra i tak přijde nudná a vy budete chtít nebohého lukkeeho vykastrovat, oslepit a zlámat v kolenou, zkuste si před hraním přihnout nějakým kvalitním alkonápojem. Hlavně žádné drogy, áno? (Ehm.)

8099/10.

Btw. Při hraní hry mě napadl skvělý reklamní slogan na tento kousek: Máte pochmurnou náladu, ať už ze zrcadla, peněženky nebo hry Blackhole? Zkuste tento antidepresivní simulátor! Máte veselou náladu, jste šťastní jako klíště v záhybu 200 kg ženy? Zkuste tento depresivní simulátor! A pokud vám je tak akorát, vyserte se na placení účtů a kupte si to taky! - Věřím, že by měl úspěch.

review:
Mårten Jonsson has a wonderfully creative mind. His games tend to be polarizing as the Steam reviews on the original Star Sky attest. You either love the artistic flair that the games present or you feel as though you’re wasting your time because you simply cannot appreciate his art form for the beauty that it is. I am still developing my taste for art and as such part of the splendor that is Star Sky 2 is lost upon me. I think that it’s unfortunate because I know that it is there. To me a quarter of an hour spent within the game is an achievement fest. Let’s see how many I can unlock in the shortest time possible. The answer  was 7 in about 11 minutes. That’s great for my Steam profile but sadly a lost opportunity to appreciate something beautiful. Ainslie, however, is a big fan of art. She’s also gifted enough to be able to press the left or right arrow key while appreciating the art that is on the screen and deft of hearing enough to listen out for music to tell her to stop a moment while the magic unfolds in front of her very eyes. Therefore because I know that she’ll be able to put into words her appreciation for Jonsson’s beautiful sequel to the original Star Sky I’ll present her another opportunity to share some little pearls.

AINSLIE’S LITTLE PEARLS

Like Warwick said I have a greater appreciation for art than what he does. With that being said I guess I did appreciate Star Sky 2 a little bit more than what he did. I don’t think that games as art generally sticks as being one game genre over another. I think all games can be viewed as art. What I liked about the game was the tranquility of the game. It is the type of game that I could come home and play a few minutes of after a rough day at work – I’m a nurse – and chill out with. That would be the greatest ambition for this game. It’s not really a game as much as it is a meditation simulator. The player doesn’t have to do too much just press one key and try out different sequences than what they have done in prior attempts with each sequence leading to a different achievement. I quite liked the the artwork but I preferred the soothing music that goes along with it.

If you’re wanting to play something that will help in your relaxation you should get Star Sky 2.

review:
インタラクティブゲーム。
基本的に前作と同じで、操作キャラを移動させて効果音が鳴る場所で待機させていればイベントが起き、このイベント発生の有無がフラグになっていくつかのエンドに辿り着くという内容だ。
今作では操作キャラが2キャラになっており、ゲーム開始時に操作したいキャラを移動させることで選択し、それぞれのキャラでフラグを立てていくことになる。片方のキャラで立てたフラグがもう片方のキャラのイベント発生のフラグになっている部分があり少しややこしいと思うかもしれないが、今作ではヒントが表示されるのでヒントをよく見て頭を整理してやれば、それほど難しくは無いと思う。
前作に比べ2つの操作キャラによるフラグ立てという違いはあるが、イベントはややマンネリ感がある。それでも、美しい色彩の背景とシルエットのアートワークが健在で前作をプレイして気に入った人や所謂"雰囲気ゲーム"が好きなら良いゲームだと思う。
